availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Joseph H. Reed (Mason County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Mason County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of John Reed and Elizabeth Reed. Married to Rebecca A. Pollock Reed in Mason County on October 1, 1856. Farmer in Mason County in 1860. Member of the Foster Town Council in Foster, Kentucky, in 1863.

ab.bibl:
KYR-0001-004-0012.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, District 3, p. 64.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, District 3, p. 221.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, X County Marriages, Film #000281846, p. 311.
